timeline.message: IGNITE-10655 .NET client should have peerClassLoading property in IgniteConfiguration class

timeline.bodyText: Do not mix -> Do not confuse
timeline.author: ptupitsyn
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1712,5 +1717,20 @@ public int SqlQueryHistorySize /// [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Usage", "CA2227:CollectionPropertiesShouldBeReadOnly")] public ICollection ExecutorConfiguration { get; set; } + + /// + /// Gets or sets a value indicating whether peer class loading is enabled for Java side. + /// + /// Important! Do not mix this property with .

replies.bodyText: I would add something like Peer assembly loading in .NET and peer class loading in Java are two distinct and independent features.
replies.author: ptupitsyn
